attributes.action: request the Queen bestow the title of Knight upon Midge Ure (James Ure OBE).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years, Midge has not got the recognition that he deserves. As co-founder and organiser of live aid and Live 8, co writer of 1984 charity song "do they know it's Christmas time, we feel that Midge has been over looked in the honours system.  
This is only fair because Bob Geldof recieved an honourary Knighthood in 1986 and Midge deserves more than the OBE he was honoured with.
